data.field:
These are the janitor tools currently available. If you're not a [janitors|janitor], these will be meaningless to you.

[id://60309]

  • Move a reply from one parent node to another
  • Turn a root node into a reply

    • [id://499680]

  • Turn a reply into a root node

    • [id://483915]

  • Re-title all nodes in a thread

    • [id://481230]

  • Move a snippet to [Code Catacombs] or [Seekers of Perl Wisdom]

    • [id://492840]

  • Move a code contribution to [Snippets Section] or [Seekers of Perl Wisdom]

    • [id://499650]

  • Move a review to [Meditations] or [Perl News]
